name: JUSTHIS#You#Rare
description: A rare stock, which is 1 of 1 edition, has 60% of stake of the artist’s music revenue for the song ‘You’ by JUSTHIS. The first owner of rare stock gets opportunity to join the official music video of the next song by JUSTHIS. When the first owner re-sells it, the transferred rare stock includes stake right of artist’s music revenue but excludes M/V opportunity which is just for the first owner. The owners of NFTs will receive dividend into their ETH wallets as much as each stake ratio of NFTs they have.
